desc.en: Pyro Alchemist. Masters of explosive artistry, these alchemists specialize in crafting dazzling fireworks. With a touch of arcane finesse, they gather rare powders and enchanted gems to create mesmerizing displays. As virtual pyrotechnic maestros, Pyro Alchemists are the go-to suppliers for adventurers seeking to illuminate the skies with vibrant bursts of magic.
